alert.note: Alert for Kemper; Neshoba; Noxubee (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued January 12 at 8:15AM CST until January 12 at 9:00AM CST by NWS Jackson
info.description: The National Weather Service in Jackson has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Noxubee County in east central Mississippi... Northern Kemper County in east central Mississippi... Neshoba County in east central Mississippi... * Until 900 AM CST. * At 815 AM CST, a severe thunderstorm was located over Dixon, or near Philadelphia, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Philadelphia around 820 AM CST. Bethsaida around 825 AM CST. Forestdale around 835 AM CST. Bluff Springs around 840 AM CST. Preston around 845 AM CST. De Kalb and Gholson around 850 AM CST. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Shuqualak, Tucker and Scooba. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 100 PM CST for central and east central Mississippi. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
